name: Franks Chaotic Adventure
description:
Frank woke up just in time to hear the princess's cry for help. Looking out the window he sees a large bat carrying her off towards the forbidden castle. Frank puts on his boots and begins to chase them. The bat crashes through a window on the top floor. Please help Frank get through all the floors in the castle and rescue his princess. Once frank has defeated all enemies and destroyed all portals on a floor a door will open to take him to the next level.

Controls:

walk = left and right arrow keys or A and D

jump = up arrow key or W

shoot= space bar

Thank you for playing!

If you liked playing our game, please leave your highest score in the comments.

Assets Used:
